sentences.sContent: a group of highly intelligent (= very intelligent )students
Sontag was once famously described as the most intelligent woman in America.
sentences.sCn: 桑塔格曾被称为美国最聪明的女人，这是众人皆知的事。

sentences.sContent: ...robots can be made as intelligent as human beings some day...
...intelligent lighting and a wealth of sensors that control both temperature and air quality are offering an unprecedented level of control...
...intelligent lighting and a wealth of sensors that control both temperature and air quality are offering an unprecedented level of control...
...technology can deliver through connected sensors and new forms of automation coupled with intelligent energy...
...we humans are intelligent and will be able to figure out better ways to make improvements...
...Many respondents rate women with golden hair as less intelligent than other people and red hair as more temperamental...

synos.tran: 智能的；聪明的；理解力强的

remMethod.val: intel(在…之间) ＋ lig(选择) ＋ ent(…的) → 聪明的

trans.tranOther: an intelligent person has a high level of mental ability and is good at understanding ideas and thinking clearly
